EmailTemplate.name: Campaign Performance Report
EmailTemplate.subject: Campaign Performance Report
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning, {!Contact.FirstName}! I’ve attached your Campaign Performance Report for the campaign you recently ran with us. I've included performance statistics as well as some observations and suggestions for future campaigns.
I'll give you a call at 11:00 am CST today and see if you have any questions or need more details.
If you don’t have any questions, then thank you for your business and we look forward to working with you again!
Brian
Brian Schmid Supervisor, Fulfillment VinSolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x 45738 Direct: 913-213-8689
